title: Tile, late 18th–early 19th century
medium: Earthenware, glazed and high fire decorated
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Standing man, pointing to the left and carrying winged and flowered blue staff in his left hand; dress of layers of bluish-white and manganese skirts, with yellow coat; high head dress. Chinoiserie type of decoration.

tombstone.epitaph:
Tile, late 18th–early 19th century.
late 18th–early 19th century. Earthenware, glazed and high fire decorated. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 1920-15-23.
